entry.source: {F812}Fujiwara\0{F87A,18}{F813,1,401301}If you want to visit the underground{F801}part of Roppongi, head for Midtown.{F801}{F802}If you're leaving from Shinjuku, go to{F801}the Hills building in Roppongi via{F801}Shibuya. You know the Hills, right?{F801}{F802}The Midtown entrance is a bit north{F801}from there.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Fujiwara\0{F87A,18}{F813,1,401302}Hmm... So your superiors turned down{F801}our request.{F801}{F802}Well, we do appreciate that you tried.{F801}I'm sorry if it caused you any grief{F801}with your higher-ups.{F801}{F802}We almost died in the Eastern Kingdom{F801}of Mikado... Let's consider it a silver{F801}lining that we get to die in Tokyo.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Fujiwara\0{F87A,18}{F813,1,401302}Hmm... So your superiors turned down{F801}our request.{F801}{F802}Well, we do appreciate that you tried.{F801}I'm sorry if it caused you any grief{F801}with your higher-ups.{F801}{F802}We almost died in the Eastern Kingdom{F801}of Mikado... Let's consider it a silver{F801}lining that we get to die in Tokyo.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Fujiwara\0{F87A,18}{F813,1,401323}Uhm... Sorry, I overreacted a little.{F801}Kinda childish of me...{F801}{F802}Though I do consider myself still young{F801}at heart! But putting such a burden on{F801}young guys like you... I'm getting old.{F801}{F802}We almost died in the Eastern Kingdom{F801}of Mikado... Let's consider it a silver{F801}lining that we get to die in Tokyo.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Fujiwara\0{F87A,18}{F813,1,401323}Uhm... Sorry, I overreacted a little.{F801}Kinda childish of me...{F801}{F802}Though I do consider myself still young{F801}at heart! But putting such a burden on{F801}young guys like you... I'm getting old.{F801}{F802}We almost died in the Eastern Kingdom{F801}of Mikado... Let's consider it a silver{F801}lining that we get to die in Tokyo.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Fujiwara\0{F87A,18}{F813,1,401314}A long time ago... Before the angels{F801}kicked us out of the Eastern Kingdom{F801}of Mikado...{F801}{F802}We didn't know how to farm the land,{F801}so we had to find a way to survive.{F801}{F802}So we came up with a business to{F801}deliver the water from the lake to{F801}people's houses.{F801}{F802}Soon, we started to offer alcohol too.{F801}That attracted more customers, and our{F801}supply depot turned into a tavern...{F801}{F802}Skins reminded me of the old days{F801}there...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Fujiwara\0{F87A,18}{F813,1,401314}A long time ago... Before the angels{F801}kicked us out of the Eastern Kingdom{F801}of Mikado...{F801}{F802}We didn't know how to farm the land,{F801}so we had to find a way to survive.{F801}{F802}So we came up with a business to{F801}deliver the water from the lake to{F801}people's houses.{F801}{F802}Soon, we started to offer alcohol too.{F801}That attracted more customers, and our{F801}supply depot turned into a tavern...{F801}{F802}Skins reminded me of the old days{F801}there...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Fujiwara\0{F87A,18}{F813,1,401311}About 20 years ago, I think, I met this{F801}little boy at Shinjuku National Park...{F801}{F802}For some reason, the kid had a demon{F801}summoning program on him.{F801}{F802}He said he was going to rescue his big{F801}sis from the angels. And he swore he'd{F801}go above the ceiling someday to do it.{F801}{F802}It was a childish idea, but it really{F801}threw me. Go above the ceiling...? I{F801}would never have thought of it!{F801}{F802}He was a special kid, that one...{F801}What was his name again... Oh yeah,{F801}I think he called himself Akira...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Fujiwara\0{F87A,18}{F813,1,401311}About 20 years ago, I think, I met this{F801}little boy at Shinjuku National Park...{F801}{F802}For some reason, the kid had a demon{F801}summoning program on him.{F801}{F802}He said he was going to rescue his big{F801}sis from the angels. And he swore he'd{F801}go above the ceiling someday to do it.{F801}{F802}It was a childish idea, but it really{F801}threw me. Go above the ceiling...? I{F801}would never have thought of it!{F801}{F802}He was a special kid, that one...{F801}What was his name again... Oh yeah,{F801}I think he called himself Akira...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Fujiwara\0{F87A,18}{F813,1,401311}If the bedrock is removed, Tokyo will{F801}see the sunlight and blue skies once{F801}again...{F801}{F802}The moment everyone's been dreaming of{F801}for so long is right around the corner.{F801}{F802}I have to ask you to see this through to{F801}the very end... Please give us our Tokyo{F801}back.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Fujiwara\0{F87A,18}{F813,1,401311}If the bedrock is removed, Tokyo will{F801}see the sunlight and blue skies once{F801}again...{F801}{F802}The moment everyone's been dreaming of{F801}for so long is right around the corner.{F801}{F802}I have to ask you to see this through to{F801}the very end... Please give us our Tokyo{F801}back.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Skins\0{F87A,19}{F813,1,401402}The demon Tayama stationed in Midtown{F801}is one of the National Defense{F801}Divinities.{F801}{F802}...Don't go fight that thing unless{F801}you're ready. If you're not, your face{F801}will look even worse than mine...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Skins\0{F87A,19}{F813,1,401403}Who? Hikaru...? A young girl wearing{F801}a school uniform?{F801}{F802}You mean that girl Isabeau you were{F801}traveling with, right? No?{F801}{F802}Hikaru... Hikaru... Hmm. Sorry, neither{F801}of us have heard of anyone by that{F801}name before...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Skins\0{F87A,149}{F813,1,401401}Back when I was still in my prime, there{F801}was a girl I used to see often while{F801}I was out on missions...{F801}{F802}A little girl playing with a wheel...{F801}{F802}I haven't seen her in a long time, but{F801}I'm strangely certain that she's still{F801}alive somewhere...{F801}{F802}Ah, sorry to bother you. I'm still{F801}counting on you about Masakado.{F801}{F802}If you unsheathe that sword in front{F801}of the huge rock in Ginza, you'll see{F801}what I mean...{F801}

I'm still{F801}counting on you about Masakado.{F801}{F802}If you unsheathe that sword in front{F801}of the huge rock in Ginza, you'll see{F801}what I mean...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Skins\0{F87A,149}{F813,1,401405}If you think about it, you'll find that{F801}human history is one selfish decision{F801}after another.{F801}{F802}He appears in the middle of Ginza and{F801}they team up to seal him away at{F801}all costs...{F801}{F802}Then they learn that Tokyo is in danger{F801}and they resurrect him because they need{F801}his help...{F801}{F802}If I was the guardian of Tokyo, I'd have{F801}already given up on humans.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Skins\0{F87A,149}{F813,1,401405}If you think about it, you'll find that{F801}human history is one selfish decision{F801}after another.{F801}{F802}He appears in the middle of Ginza and{F801}they team up to seal him away at{F801}all costs...{F801}{F802}Then they learn that Tokyo is in danger{F801}and they resurrect him because they need{F801}his help...{F801}{F802}If I was the guardian of Tokyo, I'd have{F801}already given up on humans.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Skins\0{F87A,149}{F813,1,401404}I never realized how delicious sake{F801}would be when there's no worries about{F801}tomorrow.{F801}{F802}You did good, {F843,0}...{F801}I knew you were that boy from 25{F801}years ago.{F801}{F802}...Nah, forget I said that. I'm sure{F801}you'll be walking your own path.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Skins\0{F87A,149}{F813,1,401404}I never realized how delicious sake{F801}would be when there's no worries about{F801}tomorrow.{F801}{F802}You did good, {F843,0}...{F801}I knew you were that boy from 25{F801}years ago.{F801}{F802}...Nah, forget I said that. I'm sure{F801}you'll be walking your own path.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hikaru\0{F87A,20}{F813,1,401204}You guys are just as good as I thought{F801}you'd be.{F801}{F802}You've met Tayama, Yuriko, and even{F801}Fujiwara...{F801}{F802}And you're still safe and sound!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hikaru\0{F87A,20}{F813,1,401204}You guys are just as good as I thought{F801}you'd be.{F801}{F802}You've met Tayama, Yuriko, and even{F801}Fujiwara...{F801}{F802}And you're still safe and sound!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F813,1,400302}{F843,0}, do you recall the manga{F801}I was reading?{F801}{F802}Fujiwara kindly lent me the rest of{F801}the issues that I might finish the{F801}story.{F801}{F802}The story's "Casualries" defeated the{F801}"Luxurors"...{F801}{F802}And went on to create a new country.{F801}That was the conclusion...{F801}{F802}I was startled to learn that it was{F801}based upon true events.{F801}{F802}Man has been killing one another for{F801}thousands of years...{F801}{F802}I wonder if we will further the sad{F801}cycle of man's history...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hugo\0{F87A,10}{F813,1,400704}I wonder how many wines are buried in{F801}the vastness of Tokyo...{F801}{F802}I think I could do worse than to spend{F801}my remaining years as a wine researcher...{F801}

That done, I'll go and find a{F801}nice spot...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Fujiwara\0{F87A,18}{F813,1,401301}The Japanese Defence Agency used to be{F801}in Midtown.{F801}{F802}If you consider the Reds to be Tokyo's{F801}new defense system, it's almost{F801}appropriate... But not really.{F801}{F802}If Tayama picked that spot out of some{F801}kind of poetic justice, he's got a{F801}weird sense of humor.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Fujiwara\0{F87A,18}{F813,1,401314}Doesn't the Eastern Kingdom of Mikado{F801}have anything like our Associaton?{F801}{F802}When we lived in Mikado, we didn't have{F801}anything to do for fun. So we came up{F801}with a hobby... gambling.{F801}{F802}At the tavern, we'd place bets on{F801}drinking contests.{F801}{F802}Whoever won got a prize. Soon, we{F801}started keeping a ranking board to{F801}keep track of past challenges...{F801}{F802}Frankly, this Association here has its{F801}origins in that game. You might call it{F801}a reverse import.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Fujiwara\0{F87A,18}{F813,1,401314}Doesn't the Eastern Kingdom of Mikado{F801}have anything like our Associaton?{F801}{F802}When we lived in Mikado, we didn't have{F801}anything to do for fun. So we came up{F801}with a hobby... gambling.{F801}{F802}At the tavern, we'd place bets on{F801}drinking contests.{F801}{F802}Whoever won got a prize. Soon, we{F801}started keeping a ranking board to{F801}keep track of past challenges...{F801}{F802}Frankly, this Association here has its{F801}origins in that game. You might call it{F801}a reverse import.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Skins\0{F87A,19}{F813,1,401402}So you beat Tenkai...{F801}{F802}Tenkai was a god sworn to defend his{F801}nation... And you Samurai are trained{F801}to uphold your country's peace...{F801}{F802}Both of you are patriots, but there{F801}you were, crossing swords to do what's{F801}right. Pretty ironic...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hikaru\0{F87A,20}{F813,1,401204}I had my eyes on you for a long time,{F801}you know?{F801}{F802}Even before you were born. Our meeting{F801}was... fated.{F801}{F802}The question is... if I said that with{F801}a straight face, would you be glad?{F801}Ahahaha!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Fujiwara\0{F87A,18}{F813,1,401301}About that idea of telling your{F801}superiors about us...{F801}{F802}I know it'll be a tough job, convincing{F801}those guys of our idea.{F801}{F802}But we're giving you people some very{F801}valuable information.{F801}{F802}I'm counting on their... generous spirit{F801}to repay that kindness.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Skins\0{F87A,19}{F813,1,401402}Tayama controls the National Defense{F801}Divinities.{F801}{F802}As enemies, they're terrible opponents.{F801}But as allies...{F801}{F802}...Forget I said anything. I'm too old{F801}to be dreaming impossible dreams...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hikaru\0{F87A,20}{F813,1,401204}I've got something important to go do...{F801}So this might be our last meeting.{F801}{F802}But if you keep me in your heart,{F801}we'll see each other again...{F801}{F802}The question is... if I said that with{F801}a straight face, would you be glad?{F801}Ahahaha!{F801}
